description_en: The bustling capital of Thailand, famous for street food, nightlife, temples, and markets.
description_nl: De bruisende hoofdstad van Thailand, beroemd om streetfood, uitgaansleven, tempels en markten.
highlights: Grand Palace|Khao San Road|Chatuchak Market|Wat Pho

description_en: Northern Thailand’s cultural hub, known for its old city, night markets, temples, and nearby mountains.
description_nl: Het culturele hart van Noord-Thailand, bekend om de oude stad, markten, tempels en bergen.
highlights: Doi Suthep|Old City|Sunday Night Market|Elephant Sanctuary

description_en: Thailand’s largest island, famous for beaches, nightlife, water sports and island hopping.
description_nl: Het grootste eiland van Thailand, beroemd om stranden, uitgaan, watersport en eilandhoppen.
highlights: Patong Beach|Big Buddha|Old Town|Phi Phi Islands

description_en: Lively coastal city close to Bangkok, known for beaches, nightlife, and family attractions.
description_nl: Levendige kuststad nabij Bangkok, bekend om stranden, uitgaan en attracties.
highlights: Walking Street|Sanctuary of Truth|Jomtien Beach|Floating Market

description_en: Historic former capital, UNESCO World Heritage, with ancient temples and ruins.
description_nl: Historische oude hoofdstad, UNESCO Werelderfgoed, met oude tempels en ruïnes.

description_en: Famous for stunning limestone cliffs, beaches, and island hopping (Railay, Ao Nang, Koh Phi Phi).
description_nl: Bekend om de kalkstenen kliffen, stranden en eilanden zoals Railay en Phi Phi.
highlights: Railay Beach|Ao Nang|Emerald Pool|Tiger Cave Temple

description_en: Gateway to the Golden Triangle, famous for the White Temple and hill tribe culture.
description_nl: Poort tot de Gouden Driehoek, bekend om de Witte Tempel en bergstammen.

description_en: Southern Thailand’s largest city, shopping hub and gateway to Malaysia.
description_nl: Grootste stad van Zuid-Thailand, winkelstad en poort naar Maleisië.
highlights: Kim Yong Market|Floating Market|Hat Yai Park|Asean Night Bazaar

description_en: Famous for Sukhothai Historical Park, ruins of Thailand’s first capital.
description_nl: Beroemd om Sukhothai Historical Park, ruïnes van de eerste Thaise hoofdstad.
highlights: Historical Park|Wat Mahathat|Wat Si Chum|Yom River

description_en: Transport hub to islands like Koh Samui, Koh Phangan, and Koh Tao.
description_nl: Vervoersknooppunt naar eilanden als Koh Samui, Koh Phangan en Koh Tao.
highlights: Koh Samui Pier|Surat Thani City Pillar Shrine|Tapee River
